attributes.title: Trump is horrible
attributes.review: Donald Trump is responsable for raping a girl that was 13. The girl said that he said “I’m rich I can do whatever I want” while raping her even though she asked him to please stop! He is also responsible for the deaths of 166 people in ice camps and counting . Adding to that 1,500 people have gone “missing” . They are being treated like animals if not worse. They are locked in a small room with 10 people with no windows or sunlight . Also the people in those rooms are being poisoned. The cleaning supplies they use are VERY strong and when they use them in those small room there is no air ventilation or window so they breathe in all those chemicals in which causes lung damage. KIDS AND WOMEN are also reporting that they have been molested IN THE ICE CAMPS BY STAFF MEMBERS OF THE CAMP!! WE CANT HAVE A PRESIDENT LIKE THIS!!!!     🖕🏼🍊.        WE ARE NOT ANIMALS !🇲🇽🇲🇽

attributes.title: Just no🤮
attributes.review: Sooo I was scrolling through TikTok and kept seeing people saying how AmAziNg 🤮 this app is, so of course I got it. However, it was horrible, first it took 6 hours to download, like excuse me... excuse me!😡 second when I finally opened the app, my phone glitched and all I saw was a disgusting cooked cheeto man, I mean the president🧚💅✨☺️. Anyway, now can’t use my phone because all it does is show a montage of this spray tan Oompa Loompa 😳✋. And if things couldn’t get any worse, I keep finding a path of cheetos, moldy oranges, and bottles of spray tan that lead me to the trash, also known as Trumps spawn🤢. And on top of that, it turned my cats into trump, literally they turned orange🟠 with a grosssss yellow wig, and only say “cHiNa” instead of meowing!!!😡😤😫😫So basically, this app BROKE my cats!!!! Definitely would not recommend, save your cats!!!😭😭

attributes.title: 🧝🏾‍♂️🧚🏾🦸🏾‍♀️
attributes.review: *Harry breathes intensely* “I luve you” he says, I blush and turn away “but we can be together”, I say heartbroken “I know I’m a werewolf and your an human but our luve can over come it” Harry says while pulling me into his arms “tell me you don’t luve me and you’ll never have to see me again” Harry says while lifted my chin up to face him, “I can’t tell you that, I luve you with my whole heart” I say looking deeply into his intense eyes, we embrace in a long awaited kiss “oh Harry” I say while he kisses me “Harry look” we both stop and in panic at the full moon glaring at us “Run” he says with a growl, I should have known this could never work his animal instincts are to powerful, I stand still I know I can’t out run a powerful werewolf “I know you can’t help whats about to happen Harry, I want you to know I will always luve you”

attributes.title: pregnant stink  die and me dead and you🙈
attributes.review: one day I was downloading this app so I can vote for my orange princess🍊BUT all of a sudden I heard a BANG😣on the window I check what it was IT WAS HIM😱he grab my pregnant stink bug😣I cry to tell pls give it back🥺he said no❤️I said why pls give it it’s my bestie😄he said no❤️ you HAVE TO GIVE ME 5 STARS I said I cant😺so then he killed my PREGNANT STINK BUG😿I got so MAD😠I jumped on top of him and he THREW ME💔ACROSS MY ROOM😱I had enough I ran away from him😺he found me I said get away pls I have a family😛he said no then he grab a knife and try to stab me😠I turned to eleven from stranger things and grab the knife with my power😏he said wait what I said HAHAHAHHA😹then out of no where some orange lil kids came in a tide me up he took me to his house🤢I scream for help🙈then he stab me 35 times I die😢and was never seen again....for now😏🤑

attributes.title: So bad
attributes.review: This app is 100% garbage. It took 5 hours to download. And it isn’t like trump has done much good for the US so what on earth is even downloading? I have a brand new phone that was working very well not glitching at all but as soon as I downloaded this app it keeps glitching. There was also some weird screeching that caused my dogs to start barking really loud. One of my dogs had a really bad panic attack and we had to take him to the hospital so he wouldn’t have a heart attack. He's really old. I also noticed that when I open the app my phone gets really hot really fast. I’ve also got notifications that the app has been working in the background while I’m not on it even though I don’t have it set to do so. I think we should be worried about trump and not the Chinese government.😡.

attributes.title: I JUST DONT
attributes.review: Okay, let’s start from when I get the app. This thing take like 2 days to download like if this was final fantasy. Second when I try to open it, this thing just uninstalled itself again and a big message appear on my screen saying ERROR and some other words, like umhh what the fudge, plus that music from the beginning just destroyed my ears, how to explain it, it was like a ritual music but I could hear John cena in the back and it was very loud. Which makes me go watch mma, it was very good but the opposite side win so I was a little angry, like how that men win when the other one wearing green was like a ninja bro, that men was fireeee, k that’s it, by the way can someone tell my neighbor to stop screaming in the night while dancing on his backyard, it’s kinda crazy, I don’t know.

attributes.title: please rethink ur life if ur considering downloading this app ✨
attributes.review: when I first downloaded this app I thought it would be an amazing app that will keep me updated on our 🍊orange🍊and the 2020 election events. But after only a week my phone started talking to me. I was so flustered and confused, so I decided to delete the app because I thought that was the cause of the problem. But even after deleting it, the voices that had been talking to me through my phone were now in my head. Day by day the voices drove me crazy. And now for some reason at night I can hear people outside of my window. I have every reason to believe that this is all happening because of this app. Do not download this app because you will put your life at the murder might be next. JDMSKSKSSWSJ OH MY GOD GET OU-

attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️💗Bootycheeks🧚🏼‍♀️🍑🍑🍑
attributes.review: I was downloading this interesting app with my little brother to see what all the commotion was all about u know but when I opened it I could not feel my brother breathing turns out this app killed him and now he’s dead because of you trump thanks a lot if it weren’t for you my brother would still be with me and we would be laughing together at our pelos de papelote 🌽 de presidente oh how terrible my dog even cries at the sight of the app so I decided to delete the app but I can still hear my brothers cries every night oh how I wish I lived on the moon 🌚 then non of this would have happened oh how I miss you brother I think I have decided to go home with my familia and eat carne hasada trump you are not invited and will never be thank you very much for reading BLM ❤️❤️❤️🍑🍑🌚
